bibl.title: Stesichorus and His Poetry.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Chicago. Summary in DA 46 (1986) p. 3714-A. - The subject of this thesis is the new P. Lille poem. A new reading is proposed for vv. 228-231.
bibl.seg: Tsitsibakou-Vasalos Evanthia, Stesichorus and His Poetry.
Diss. Univ. of Chicago. Summary in DA 46 (1986) p. 3714-A. - The subject of this thesis is the new P. Lille poem. A new reading is proposed for vv. 228-231.
